name: BattleShips II
overview: Written in AMOS Professional. Game ideas by Patrik & Tor Jansson. Coding by Patrik Jansson. Graphics by Tor & Patrik Jansson. Title music by Mark Salud, additional music/FMV sound by Ruben Monteiro and sound FX/FMV sound by Patrik Jansson. Based on the strategy pencil and paper or the popular Milton Bradley board game, but for 4 possible players in one game.
